chapters.title: Chapter 28:  Footprints in AirChapter 29:  Eyes Without PityChapter 30:  Children of Shadow
chapters.info: Jaret Byar, p. 375—Tall Child of the Light. He has little in the way of human emotions, and thinks nothing of killing people. He hates no one; if he believes they should die, it is only because he thinks they should die, not because he hates them.
